subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the bases loaded and two outs in the ninth inning, Aaron Heilman fielded a dribbler by Bobby Abreu and threw it well wide of first base, handing the Phillies a victory.
snippet: With the bases loaded and two outs in the ninth inning, Aaron Heilman fielded a dribbler by Bobby Abreu and threw it well wide of first base, handing the Phillies a victory.
